attributes.action: Voice his support for Sri-Lankan-born Deva Kumarasiri.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Kumarasiri is a post master who holds a policy of not serving those who refuse to learn to speak English, and who thereby create delays and confusion in his post office for other customers.
Mr Kumarasiri is precisely the kind of person this country is crying out for, he has integrated wholly within Britain, taken its language, its customs, its values and its flag as his own.
He has since been forced out by a vocal minority of politically correct troublemakers from his job.
This is wholly unfair and we request the PM voices his public support (for once) for a man who has done his utmost to become part of our country.
Reinstate Mr Kumarasiri, Now!

Thank you.

rejection.details: As this relates to an individual case, please contact the Post Office to raise your concerns.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
